data.name: AllItemsText
data.value: All Items
data.comment: this is the parent category which contains all user created objects [common]

data.name: CategoryBrowserSelectionRequiredText
data.value: You are required to select a specific {0}.

data.name: CategoryCreationErrorText
data.value: An error occurred while attempting to create the new category.
data.comment: this is displayed on an error message when something goes wrong while creating a new category [designtime]

data.name: CategoryIllegalCharactersText
data.value: Category name '{0}' contains one or more illegal characters. ('\').
data.comment: this is displayed on an error message when trying to create a category with illegal characters in it [designtime]

data.name: CategoryMovingErrorText
data.value: A category with the same name '{0}' already exists. It is not possible to have duplicate category names under the same parent category. Provide a new name to continue or make sure you have the rights to view all items.
data.comment: this is displayed on an error message when trying to create a category with the same name under the same parent category [designtime]

data.name: CategoryNameRequiredText
data.value: Please supply a name for the new category.
data.comment: this is a warning message which appears if the user does not enter a name when creating a new category [designtime]

data.name: CategoryNotFoundErrorText
data.value: Category not found.
data.comment: This is the error message displayed when getting a category which does not exist.

data.name: CategoryRenamingErrorText
data.value: An error occurred while attempting to rename the new category.
data.comment: this is the message which is displayed when something goes wrong while renaming a category

data.name: CategoryRenamingModifyRightsErrorText
data.value: {0} does not have modify rights on category {1}.
data.comment: this is the message which is displayed when the user doesn't have modify rights to rename a category

data.name: ContextBrowserRootText
data.value: Context Browser

data.name: DeleteCategoriesErrorText
data.value: Some categories could not be deleted because they contain child items. Delete or move all items in the selected categories before removing them.
data.comment: Error text shown when attempting to delete multiple non-empty categories. [designtime]

data.name: DeleteCategoryConfirmationText
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
data.comment: this is the message displayed when the user deletes a category [designtime]

data.name: DeleteCategoryErrorText
data.value: The category cannot be deleted because it or one of its child categories has child items. Delete or move all items in this category before removing the category, or make sure you have the rights to view all items.
data.comment: Error text shown when attempting to delete a non-empty category. [designtime]

data.name: DeleteChildrenWarningText
data.value: A category cannot be removed if there are existing child items. Delete or move all items in this category before removing the category, or make sure you have the rights to view all items.
data.comment: this message is displayed when there are children objects that exist under a parent category and the user attempts to delete the parent category [designtime]

data.name: DuplicateNameErrorText
data.value: A category with the name '{0}' already exists on the same level. Provide a new name to continue or make sure you have the rights to view all items.
data.comment: this is displayed on an error message when a category is created using the same name as one which already exists [eg: A category with the name 'CompanyABC' already exists on the same level. Provide a new name to continue or make sure you have the rights to view all items. ][designtime]

data.name: NewCategoryText
data.value: New Category
data.comment: this is the title of a pop up box which prompts the user for a name and description of the new category being created [designtime]

data.name: PrivateTreeRootText
data.value: My Folder

data.name: RenameErrorText
data.value: An error occurred while attempting to create the new category.
data.comment: Message that notifies the user that an error occured while attempting to create a new category record [designtime]

data.name: RootCategoryErrorText
data.value: One cannot rename or delete the root category.

data.name: SelectCategoryText
data.value: Select a category
data.comment: this is the title of the categories popup where the user can select a category [common]

data.name: SelectSpecificItem
data.value: Select {0}
data.comment: this is the title of a pop up window where the user can select an object [eg: Select View] [location: rules designer - actions]
